meanings.definition: A lock of hair growing or falling over the forehead.
meanings.sent1: Her curly forelocks framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The little girl's forelocks bounced as she ran in the playground.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous breeze kept playing with her forelocks during the outdoor picnic.
meanings.sent4: His forelocks danced in the wind like golden ribbons.
meanings.sent5: The barber trimmed her forelocks with precision, enhancing her youthful look.

meanings.sent1: He quickly forelocks the opportunity to ask her out on a date.
meanings.sent2: The coach forelocks the chance to motivate his team before the big game.
meanings.sent3: She playfully forelocks his hat and runs away giggling.
meanings.sent4: The detective forelocks the suspect, preventing any escape.
meanings.sent5: The teacher forelocks the attention of the students with an engaging story.
